meanings.definition: Causing someone to feel strong emotion or amazement.
meanings.sent1: The view from the mountaintop was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so breathtaking that the audience gasped.
meanings.sent4: Her performance was like a breathtaking dance of colors on stage.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was a breathtaking spectacle of light and sound.

meanings.sent1: The ballroom was decorated in a breathtaking style.
meanings.sent2: The grand palace was truly breathtaking in its architecture.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so breathtakingly decorated that no one wanted to cut it.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a breathtaking tapestry of flowers and greenery.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall cascading down the rocks was a breathtaking sight to behold.

meanings.definition: So surprising or impressive as to take one's breath away.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected plot twist in the movie was truly breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The sudden appearance of a shooting star was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The price of the vintage car was so breathtaking that he had to sit down.
meanings.sent4: The speed at which the athlete ran was breathtaking, breaking all records.
meanings.sent5: The magician's disappearing act was a breathtaking moment of wonder.
